author: Rebecca Klar
title: Protests banned at capitol, on state property in California
description: California's Highway Patrol (CHP) said it will no longer grant permits for protests on state property, including the state Capitol, following demonstrations Monday against Gov. Gavin Newsom's (D) stay-at-home order,...
